Welcome to getpaid.core’s documentation!¶

The getpaid.core package stands at the center of the GetPaid e-commerce solution, which currently supports both a shopping cart and a check-out wizard for the Plone content management system. The workflows and interfaces defined here in the core establish the concepts which all GetPaid components, packages, and plug-ins use to integrate with one another.

At the moment, only one developer’s guide exists yet: a draft that explains how to write a payment processor. Enjoy!
